snippet.title: POOLS - Devlog 1
snippet.description:
First devlog. Some stuff here might be already in Demo.
We also fixed a ton of bugs and other small stuff!

Patreon: https://patreon.com/Tensori
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2663530?utm_source=youtube
Website: https://poolsthegame.com
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/s3KMR2xZdY
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tensori.fi/
X: https://twitter.com/Tensori_ltd

Music is "Lone Wolf" by GuilhermeBernardes from Pixabay https://pixabay.com/users/guilhermebernardes-24203804/

00:00 Ripple system
00:15 Ladder system
00:28 Water slide system
00:43 Level 2
00:47 Acoustics progress
00:50 Outro
